name: Dice of Mine
description:
GMTK Game Jam 2022 entry.

Help this miner dwarf escape the abandoned mines with his lucky dice... Well, let's hope they really are lucky, because what he does depends on what they roll.

CONTROLS:
- WASD to move
- Mouse click to attack

You have until the next roll (turn) to spend your actions. The blocking action is automatic and lasts for an extra turn. Manage your actions, as the monsters don't depend on dice to move and attack.

This game was developed by:
- James Key (Art & Design)
- Jacob "Grouch" Wilbanks (Development, Sound and Design)
- Luciano Menasce Rosset (Development and Design)
Special thanks to Arin Eakins for the cave sounds :)

Thank you for playing!
